SA05n822:2: pratijñātaṃ samutpāde trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 1 ||
SA05n822:4: bandhuvargaiḥ parityaktaṃ trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 2 ||
SA05n822:8: ekākī taṃ hi bhokṣyāmi trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 4 ||
SA05n822:10: andhībhūto'smyahaṃ nātha trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 5 ||
SA05n822:12: durlaṅghyaṃ ca mayā dṛṣṭaṃ trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 6 ||
SA05n822:13: dharmādharma na vijñātaṃ gamyāgamyaṃ na veditam |
SA05n822:14: acetano'smyahaṃ nātha trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 7 ||
SA05n822:16: pacyāmi narake ghore trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 8 ||
SA05n822:18: kṛtā mayā sattvahiṃsā trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 9 ||
SA05n822:20: veṣṭitaṃ karmasūtreṇa trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 10 ||
SA05n822:22: īdṛśaṃ jīvitaṃ loke trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 11 ||
SA05n822:24: panthānaṃ nātra paśyāmi trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 12 ||
SA05n822:26: rājahatyāṃ tadā manye trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 13 ||
SA05n822:28: gacchāmi śaraṇaṃ kasya trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata || 14 ||
